extensionDescription_v1.message: Firefox Relay makes it easy to create email aliases that forward to your real inbox.
extensionDescription_v1.description: Shortened description of the extension. Must remain under 132 characters. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

extensionDescription_mask.message: Firefox Relay makes it easy to create email masks that forward to your true inbox.
extensionDescription_mask.description: Shortened description of the extension. Must remain under 132 characters. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

extensionDescriptionStore.message: Firefox Relay helps you protect your real email address — the one most closely tied to your online identity. It lets you generate unique, random aliases you can use to sign up for accounts, apps, or newsletters, and forwards messages to your real address. If you find that an account is sending unwanted email or spam, you can block the alias and it will stop sending email to your inbox. Once you no longer want an account, you can delete the alias.
extensionDescriptionStore.description: Shortened description of the extension. Must remain under 132 characters. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

labelRelayPremium.description: Alt text for the premium Relay logo. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay Premium".

firstRunP.message: You’ve successfully installed the Firefox Relay add-on. To get started, sign in to Relay with your Firefox account.
firstRunP.description: First sentence on the first run page after installing the add-on. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay", "Relay", or "Firefox".

firstRunCollectDataLabel.message: Allow Mozilla to collect information about how you use this extension.
firstRunCollectDataLabel.description: On the first run page after installing the add-on, we show a toggle and ask the user if the add-on can send interaction data to Mozilla. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Mozilla".

allowDataCollection.description: The label on the toggle that ALLOWS sending interaction data to Mozilla.

disableDataCollection.description: The label on the toggle that DISABLES sending interaction data to Mozilla.

firstRunPrefP.message: Collecting interaction data when you do things like click the Relay icon in your toolbar or create a new alias helps us learn what is working well and where we can improve. You can always turn this off in the Settings panel.
firstRunPrefP.description: On the first run page after installing the add-on, we tell the user how interaction data helps Mozilla. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay".

firstRunPrefP_mask.message: Collecting interaction data when you do things like click the Relay icon in your toolbar or create a new mask helps us learn what is working well and where we can improve. You can always turn this off in the Settings panel.
firstRunPrefP_mask.description: On the first run page after installing the add-on, we tell the user how interaction data helps Mozilla. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay".

popupSettingsShowIcon.message: Show Relay icon in email fields on websites
popupSettingsShowIcon.description: In the settings panel, we display a toggle so the user can enable or disable the Relay icon in websites. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay".

popupSettingsCollectData.message: Allow Mozilla to collect interaction data
popupSettingsCollectData.description: The label on the toggle that ENABLES sending interaction data to Mozilla. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Mozilla".

popupReportIssueSiteLabelHeadline.message: I’m having issues with this website

popupReportIssueCaseOne.message: Email mask was not accepted by website

popupReportIssueCaseTwo.message: Relay add-on caused a visual issue with the website

popupReportIssueCaseThree.message: I haven’t received an email from this website that I was expecting

popupReportIssueSuccessBody.message: Thank you for helping us to improve Firefox Relay!

popupSignUpPanelIntro.message: Get started by signing in to Relay with your Firefox account.
popupSignUpPanelIntro.description: In the pop-up panel, before the user has signed in, we invite to them sign in. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay", OR "Firefox".

popupRemainingAliases_2.description: Tells the user how many more aliases they can make.

popupRemainingAliases_2_mask.description: Tells the user how many more masks they can make.

popupRemainingFreeMasks.description: Tells the user how many more free masks they can make.

popupRecentlyUsedMasks.description: Label for list of most recently used masks.

popupUnlimitedAliases.description: Tells the premium user how many aliases they have created.

popupUnlimitedAliases_mask.description: Tells the premium user how many masks they have created.

labelFromThisWebsite.description: In the pop-up panel, the use can view masks only created or used on a certain website.

labelAllEmailMasks.description: In the pop-up panel, the use can view all masks they've created.

popupOnboardingMaxAliasesPanelBody.message: You’re a Firefox Relay power user!
popupOnboardingMaxAliasesPanelBody.description: In the pop-up panel, when a free user has hit their mask limit, we tell them they're a power-user. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

popupRegisterDomainHeadline.message: Get a custom domain for Relay email aliases

popupRegisterDomainHeadline_mask.message: Get a custom subdomain for Relay email masks

popupUpgradeToPremiumBanner.message: Upgrade to Relay Premium for more protection!

popupEducationalComponent1Body.message: Relay can help you protect your email no matter where you are.

popupAttachmentSizeIncreaseBody.message: Firefox Relay can now forward emails up to 25MB, including attachments.

popupEndOfIntroPricingHeadline.message: Our intro pricing offer ends soon!

popupEndOfIntroPricingBody.message: Get Relay Premium before September 27th and enjoy unlimited masking at our introductory month-to-month price.

popupEndOfIntroPricingCountdownDays.description: This label displayed on top of a large number representing the number of DAYS of the remaining time that the introductory pricing offer is still valid. Please abbreviate if the word exceeds 5 characters.

popupEndOfIntroPricingCountdownHours.description: This label displayed on top of a large number representing the number of HOURS of the remaining time that the introductory pricing offer is still valid. Please abbreviate if the word exceeds 5 characters.

popupEndOfIntroPricingCountdownMinutes.description: This label displayed on top of a large number representing the number of MINUTES of the remaining time that the introductory pricing offer is still valid. There's not much room for this, hence the abbreviation.

popupEndOfIntroPricingCountdownSeconds.description: This label displayed on top of a large number representing the number of SECONDS of the remaining time that the introductory pricing offer is still valid. There's not much room for this, hence the abbreviation.

popupCriticalEmailForwardingBody.message: Relay Premium allows you to receive only critical emails sent to an alias. You’ll receive emails like receipts but not marketing emails.

popupCriticalEmailForwardingBody_mask.message: Relay Premium allows you to receive only critical emails sent to a mask. You’ll receive emails like receipts but not marketing emails.

popupBlockPromotionalEmailsBody.message: Enable Block Promotional Emails on an alias to stop marketing emails from reaching your inbox.

popupBlockPromotionalEmailsBody_mask.message: Enable Block Promotional Emails on a mask to stop marketing emails from reaching your inbox.

popupBlockPromotionalEmailsBodyNonPremiu.message: With Relay Premium, you can block promotional emails from reaching your inbox while still allowing you to receive emails like receipts or shipping information.

popupBundlePromoHeadline_2.description: DO NOT TRANSLATE "Mozilla VPN". This string includes a savings variable, e.g. 50%

popupBundlePromoBody_2.message: 1 year plan including Relay Premium + Mozilla VPN for $MONTHLY_PRICE$/month.
popupBundlePromoBody_2.description: DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay Premium" and "Mozilla VPN". This string includes a monthly price variable, e.g. $4.99

popupBundlePromoBodyFreePlan.message: Upgrade your subscription to get both Relay Premium + Mozilla VPN for $MONTHLY_PRICE$/month. Save $SAVINGS$!
popupBundlePromoBodyFreePlan.description: DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay Premium" and "Mozilla VPN". This string includes a monthly price variable, e.g. $4.99. It also includes a savings variable, e.g. 50%

popupPhoneMaskingPromoBody.message: With phone number masking, you can now create a phone number mask that helps you get texts and calls without revealing your true number.

popupSignBackInHeadline.message: Sign back in with your aliases

popupSignBackInHeadline_mask.message: Sign back in with your email masks

popupSignBackInBody.message: To create a new alias when you’re asked for your email, open the context menu (right-click or control-click) in an email field. From there you can create and use a new alias right away.

popupSignBackInBody_mask_v2.message: To create a new email mask when you’re asked for your email, open the context menu (right-click or control-click) in an email field. From there you can create and use a new mask right away.

pageInputIconSignUpText.message: Visit the Firefox Relay website to sign in or create an account.
pageInputIconSignUpText.description: In the website content icon pop-up, before a user has signed in, we tell them to sign in. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

pageInputIconSignUpButton.description: In the website content icon pop-up, before a user has signed in, we tell them to sign in. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

pageInputIconSelectFromYourCurrentEmailM.message: Select from your current email masks
pageInputIconSelectFromYourCurrentEmailM.description: In the website content icon pop-up, users can re-use masks they've already created. This label is displayed when this is the only list visible.

pageInputIconAdditionalEmailMasks.description: In the website content icon pop-up, users can re-use masks they've already created.

pageInputIconPreviouslyUsedMask.description: In the website content icon pop-up, users can select specific masks they've created on the current website.

pageInputIconJoinPremiumWaitlist.description: For some free users (based on geographic region), Firefox Relay premium is not avialable yet. We instead prompt users to join our waitlist to be notified when it is available.

pageInputIconUseExistingAliasFromTheSite.message: Use Existing Alias from this Site…
Use existing mask from this site…

pageInputIconMaxAliasesError.message: You have already created the maximum number of aliases
pageInputIconMaxAliasesError.description: Tells the user they have already created the max number of aliases.

pageInputIconMaxAliasesError_mask.message: You have already created the maximum number of masks
pageInputIconMaxAliasesError_mask.description: Tells the user they have already created the max number of masks.

pageNoMasksRemaining.message: You have no more free email masks.
pageNoMasksRemaining.description: Error message that appears when a free tier user uses all of their masks.

profilePageInvalidAliasCharactersError.description: Error message that appears when the user tries to use special characters when labelling an mask.

profilePageDefaulAliasLabelText.description: On the user's profile page, this text appears for a mask when it doesn't have a label.

popupDataCollectionBody.message: You can allow Relay to collect optional data that allows us to sync your alias labels across your devices with the websites where they’re created and used.

popupDataCollectionBody_mask.message: You can allow Relay to collect optional data that allows us to sync your mask labels across your devices with the websites where they’re created and used.

popupPrivacyNoticeUpdateBody.message: To improve the reliability of Firefox Relay in the event that an email can’t be delivered, we will temporarily keep the email on our servers until it has been delivered. We will never hold onto it for more than three days.
